titles.title: Bless Thou the Lord O my Soul

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
C
Bless Thou the Lord oh my soul
Praise ye the Lord
(Praise ye the Lord)
Bless Thou the Lord oh my soul
Praise ye the Lord

verse.name: c2
verse.lines:
Bless Thou the Lord oh my soul
Praise ye the Lord
(Praise ye the Lord)
Bless Thou the Lord oh my soul
Praise ye the Lord
(Praise the Lord)

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I will sing unto the Lord
As long as I live
I will sing praise to my God
While I have my being
My meditation of Him shall be sweet
I will be glad I will be glad in the Lord
